[ara una gira-ia geni-na komu-i-na ma vanoa-gi-na]

CONJ-S:3P take food-P:3P CONJ-S:3P hold-O:3P basket D:3P-P-DEIC CONJ-S:3P go
` "You go and stay with Titipohona, children," said the women and the men (lit: people)
of the village, and they took their food and they held their baskets and they went ...'

tier.item: c. Amu ao-a na ra/o va/a-mae-u
Maybe you wanted to kill me.
